title: Ready or not
creator_credit: Film Victoria, Michael Vaughan, David Campbell and Colin Budds
brief_description: Conflict arises when a small factory facing closure is taken over by a large corporation who use it as a test case for the introduction of modern computerised manufacturing equipment. Relations between workers, management and unions deteriorate rapidly until an accident in the factory brings differences to a head.
